column4: What is so special about X.org? I've heard that alot of people want it, what is it exactly? (I know its a new version of XF86)
i'm eager because it includes power saving features for my video card... about a 10% impact on battery life for me...
i doubt it could look better than X... maybe there's more subpixel hinting or something -dunno.
i've had some big troubles to get cd bruning working as a normal user without ide-scsi  - works fine for as root.
